patterns: How can I apply for financial aid?
How do I apply for financial aid?
How to apply for financial aid online?
Where can I access the financial aid application?
responses:
Access AUBsis as you usually would using your AUB net login, 
 Click on Student Schedule or Registration 
 Choose Student Award and Financial Aid Tab 
Click on Apply for Student Aid
Fill the application and, before submitting it online, make a printout of your completed online application.
Click on Submit in order to have the online application loaded to the financial aid system.
Submit the hard copy along with a passport-size photograph and all the required documents to the Financial Aid Office IN PERSON prior to the deadline. 
Applications with missing information and/or missing documents will be considered incomplete and hence will not be evaluated.

how can I order the academic transcript as pdf ?

responses: You can email the registrar and ask them to scan the papers for you.
if you need an official transcript sent somewhere you can have it sent as an e-transcript by email.

patterns: How can I get my unofficial transcript from AUB
How can i get my academic transcript as a pdf?
How can I order my academic transcript as a pdf
soft copy academic transcript
order academic trasncript as pdf
How do I get a soft copy of my Academic Transcript?
responses: You can just save the website page of ur transcript on ur desktop and then attach it. Using chrome, just right click and click "save as" or "print".
CTRL+P to save your chrome page as pdf. This is considered an unofficial academica transcript
click your brower settings button and then "print". you can then choose to save the page as a PDF.

patterns: Can anyone explain to me the difference between cumulative and overall GPA in the academic transcript?
What is the difference between cumulative and overall GPA
What is cumulative GPA
What is overall GPA
What is overall GPA
what does cumulative GPA  mean
What does overall GPA mean
responses: Basically, Cumulative gpa: grades of all courses you have already compeleted from your current major (even non-major courses). Overall GPA includes the weighted average of your current major gpa and your past major (considering you transferred majors).

responses: Via aub sis, you pay via credit card and you can pick it up, or have it sent to you

click your brower settings button and then "print". you can then choose to save the page as a PDF. then attach it normally

patterns: How can I apply for financial aid?
How do I apply for financial aid?
How to apply for financial aid online?
Where can I access the financial aid application?
responses:
Access AUBsis as you usually would using your AUB net login 
Click on Student Awards and Financial Aid 
Click on Apply for Student Aid 
Fill the application and, before submitting it online, make a printout of your completed online application. 
Click on Submit in order to have the online application loaded to the financial aid system. 
Submit the hard copy along with a passport-size photograph and all the required documents to the Financial Aid Office IN PERSON prior to the deadline. 
Applications with missing information and/or missing documents will be considered incomplete and hence will not be evaluated.

Go to AUBsis, press the last tab in the middle "Student Awards and Financial Aid", and then 'apply for student aid'. There you put in all the requirements and then submit the required documents in person at the financial aid's office in West hall.

Use your AUBsis to access the application under 'Student Awards and Financial Aid'. The application should be there. After submitting, you must hand in the documents in person at the F-Aid office at AUB.

responses: The aub office sends an email to all students for when they need to apply for the work study program. Click the link in that email and fill the application form.

patterns: If i'm employed at the university as part of the work-study program, do i need to submit my bank account information or can i get paid via check?
how do I receive payment for the work study program ?
how will I receive payment from the work study program
where will I receive my work study salary
responses: You have to submit your IBAN number to the comptroller office
If you haven't already provided an IBAN in your application, go to college hall, second floor, comptroller office and they will give you a form to fill it. N.B : the IBAN is provided by the bank.

patterns: When do we hear back about work study if we've applied?
who can I contact for the work study application
When do i receive a reply for work study
responses: Not before the application close date.
Sometimes they respond at the end of the semester. Go to Mrs. Ramza at third floor in the west hall and ask.her about it, she might help you get your application work at the time.

patterns: Is there any way to cancel an work study application?
cancel my work study application
don't want work study anymore
cancel my work study application
responses: For the work study application, if you don't show up to the meeting or don't reply for (maybe) 3 days, they give the job to someone else.

patterns: How much is the work study program currently giving per hour?
What is the work study salary?
How much do we get for the work study program?
what is the hourly pay rate for work study program?
work study salary
how much is the work study program salary
responses: Currently, they are giving from 13,000 to 16,000 L.L per hour, usually either to remove from tuition, or to get it cash. Some jobs have more money but you get them removed from tuition.
